name: Hoco Poco (itch)
description:
A harry potter duel style free-4-all local multiplayer.

Controller(s)

  • Left stick to move
  • Hold trigger/bumper to start casting a spell
  • Right stick to draw the spell pattern
  • Release trigger/bumper to cast the spell
  • Press A to jump

Keyboard + mouse

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Left mouse button to jump
  • Hold right mouse button to start casting
  • Move mouse around to draw a spell pattern
  • Release right mouse button to cast spell

✨ Wizards brawling majestic not violent ✨

💦 Use magic spells to knock each other off the island 💦

made for the Sokpop Patreon
